audioContentItems.fileTranscript: Thank you for calling Zinus, this is (Agent's Name), may I have your name and email address, please?
Hi. My name is Alexis and email is cloudchaser252@gmail.com.
Thank you, Alex! How can I help you today?

We just ordered a bed and a mattress. It was actually delivered last week. Mattress was fine, there's just something about the bed frame. We're kind of not - liking the color. I think we still have the return period so we would like to take advantage of it and we will buy something else.
We're sorry to hear the bed frame did not work out for you. We can take a look at your options and discuss the return process. May I have your order number, please?
Thank you! Please bear with me while I validate your order.
I see an order placed January 9, 2024 for a bed frame and a mattress. To confirm the item that needs to be returned, that would be Olivia Metal and Wood Platform Bed Frame in Full size, correct?
Looking at the tracking details, it shows it was delivered January 13, 2024. I can confirm that you are still within the 30 days of your return period, Alex.

To initiate the return, the bed frame needs to be returned back to us. Ensure that the item will be returned in its original packaging - complete with all original parts including the instruction manual.
We will then send you a prepaid return label and provide instructions for arranging a FedEx pickup.
After we receive the returned item, a refund will be generated back to the original form of payment within 2-3 business days. We will email you all these details right after this call.
I hope I was able to explain the process of the return. Is there anything else I can help you with at the moment, Alex?
Nope. Sounds good. I will wait for your email.
Awesome! If you have any questions, feel free to respond to the email anytime. And thank you for calling Zinus, we hope you have a wonderful day!

settings.text: Type "call ticket" on the Search Answers box.
Write customer's email address: cloudchaser252@gmail.com. Then, click on Customer Name and write "Alexis".
Describe the reason for the call.
Take note of the order number. All of our customer purchases in zinus.com can be accessed in Shopify.
Write the Order Number in the Search bar: 330030.
Clicking on the order will redirect you to the order page.
In the Answers section, type in "Return Request (Unopened Package)".
Use the Answer to discuss the return process with the customer.
Click on "Resolution" and complete the documentation by providing a summary of the resolution given.
Make sure that all necessary information on the documentation is complete (customer's name, email address, order number).

Details section also needs to be filled whenever we handle a customer contact. When necessary, we would need to fill the Reseller where the item was purchased or being purchased, Order number, Date of purchase, and S K U.
For orders placed in Zinus.com, we would only need to supply the Order number and the product S K U in question.
For Zinus.com purchase, we always need to put in "ZC" before the S K U. This ensures separation of current order numbers in Shopify similar to the old order numbers from way back 2016 - 2017.
Now, click and type in the Order Number and the S K U of the customer in the Details box.
Write in Details box: Order no. ZC330030 HBPBB-14F
A mattress purchase is the only item that has 100 days return period. Since the customer wants to return a bed frame in this simulation, we would need to type in 30 days on the highlighted selection.
Write "Return" in the Topics search box.
The conversation has been updated successfully. This conversation will remain in "Waiting Status" indicating that we are waiting for a response from the customer.

Normally for calls from customers who purchased a product directly on our website and wanting to return a non-mattress for a refund, we confirm the address where the item will be picked up during the call. This eliminates the wait time for our customers to re-confirm the address to be indicated on the prepaid return label.
On emails, it is needed to re-confirm the current address of the customer where the product is to ensure we are addressing the return label to the right pickup location.
In this simulation, we will wait for a response from the customer.
Provided that the customer responds back within the day. We'll notice a green dot will appear on the customer line. Click on the customer to open the conversation.
Check the customer's address to see if it is complete. Then respond to the customer by informing them of the next steps.
On the answers section, type in Tier 2.

"Acknowledgement (Endorsement to Tier 2)" answer is being used to introduce the customer to the next steps in processing either a replacement, return label or both by our Tier 2. Click on the 'Use" icon to use the template for email.
We're now ready to endorse the conversation to Tier 2. Next step is to create internal notes for Tier 2 to use as a reference for what they need to do on the conversation.
On the Answers section, type in "template".
As a standard, we only have 3 Templates used for various Tier 2 and Tier 3 request. For this scenario, we will be using "[Template] - Return Label Request".
All information needed on the template can be found on the Order Page in Shopify. Click on the Shopify tab to proceed.

Copy and paste all necessary information from Shopify to the template. It is important that all information is filled with accuracy. Tier 2, specifically, may re-assign the conversation back to the original agent should there be any discrepancies or corrections needed. It is also imperative to follow the following rules when filling the form.

Order number should have a ZC if it is an order found in Shopify. Orders without the ZC would indicate an order that was placed around 2016 and 2017 and needs to be checked by a Tier 2 in a separate data sheet.
Customer's number should be in a format of 123-123-1234, with the dashes.
Customer's address should be ALL CAPS and complete.
Customer's concern should not be vague. Indicate if they need a replacement with a return label, only a replacement or just a return label for a refund.
We've filled the information for you as a sample. Familiarize yourself with the details shown on this sample template. In a real process, once you're done, click on "Add Note".
Next, assign the conversation to the Tier 2 bucket to be worked on by an available Tier 2. On the search bar in "Assign To" type in "Tier 2".
You're all set! Conversation is now assigned to the Tier 2 bucket and will be worked on by the next available Tier 2 representative.
